details.description:
Spacious new development in prime Bushwick!
Be the first to live here. Incredible 2 bedroom 1 bath with all the bells and whistles. Great shared backyard space! Laundry in the unit, dishwasher, and central AC. Top of the line stainless steel appliances. Each bedroom is on the opposite side for ultimate privacy, with a big living room/kitchen area in between. The exposed brick and beams add a dynamic element to the apartment.
The building features a gorgeous roof deck with skyline views, and comfy patio furniture for your enjoyment. Storage in the basement.
Myrtle-Wyckoff L and M trains just 1 block away. Surrounded by top rated restaurants and bars - Dromedary Tiki Bar, Milk & Pull Coffee, L'imprimerie Bakery, Boobie Trap Bar, Bushwick Burger Co, Williamsburg Pizza, and many more.
Available 5/1 Small pets welcome No broker fee

Lovely studio apt at the super nice and well maintained Balsam Village complex.
The property is close to everything, yet far away enough to feel like country-style living. Enjoy being close to Shirley Chisholm State Park. Conveniently located only 3 blocks to the subway and 10 minutes to JFK. Take the A train and get to Manhattan in only 40 minutes. The location is also very close to the highways such as the Belt Parkway, North & South Conduit, Nassau Expressway & the Van Wyck Expressway.
At Balsam Village Complex most of the utilities like water, cooking, and heating gas, trash removal, and snow removal are included with the rent. The only thing tenant pays is electric and cable (if they choose to have to cable). The complex features a wonderful maintenance staff that will take care of you and all your problems in a quick professional manor at no extra charge. Laundry is available for the tenants. Parking is available for a monthly fee.
Contact me for a showing today!
